title: SOLD T206 SC 350 Harry Gasper PSA 4
author: AMBST95

posts.post_title: SOLD T206 SC 350 Harry Gasper PSA 4
posts.post_content:
I somehow have 2 of this card and am looking to trade for another T206 in PSA 4 on my want list or would sell for $ including shipping.  I will accept payment via Paypal Gift.
